import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; const teamColor = { atl: 'hawks', bkn: 'nets', bos: 'celtics', cha: 'hornets', chi: 'bulls', cle: 'cavaliers', dal: 'mavericks', den: 'nuggets', det: 'pistons', gsw: 'warriors', hou: 'rockets', ind: 'pacers', lac: 'clippers', lal: '#552583', mem: 'grizzlies', mia: 'heat', mil: 'bucks', min: 'timberwolves', nop: 'pelicans', nyk: 'knicks', okc: 'thunder', orl: 'magic', phi: '76ers', phx: 'suns', por: 'blazers', sac: 'kings', sas: 'spurs', tor: 'raptors', uta: 'jazz', was: 'wizards' } export default function PlayerProfile(props) { let cats = ['min', 'pts', 'reb', 'ast', 'stl', 'blk'] let statData = props.seasonStats[0] console.log(props.playerInfo) console.log(props) return (
{props.playerInfo[0].displayFirstLast}
{props.playerInfo[0].teamCity} {props.playerInfo[0].teamName}
Position: {props.playerInfo[0].position}
Jersey: {props.playerInfo[0].jersey}
{/*

Team: {props.playerInfo[0].teamCity} {props.playerInfo[0].teamName}

Position: {props.playerInfo[0].position}

Jersey: {props.playerInfo[0].jersey}

*/}

Current Season Stats

{cats.map((item) => ( <>
{props.seasonStats[0][item]}
{item.toUpperCase()}
))}
) }
